title: Headrick Technology and Imperialism Secondary SAQ

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify one piece of evidence the author uses to support his argument regarding how technology facilitated the rapid conquest of Africa. b) Identify one factor in addition to the changes mentioned by the author that enabled the European colonization of Africa in the late nineteenth century. c) Explain one way in which the technological developments described by the author affected Europeans within Europe during the late nineteenth century.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify one piece of evidence the author uses to support his argument regarding how technology facilitated the rapid conquest of Africa. b) Identify one factor in addition to the changes mentioned by the author that enabled the European colonization of Africa in the late nineteenth century. c) Explain one way in which the technological developments described by the author affected Europeans within Europe during the late nineteenth century.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
